page.title: 05CRICKET CLUB
page.content: We visited Astley Bridge Cricket Club where we spoke to one of the groundsmen. He told us about a lot of things which had happened there. We found out that there had been two fires on the cricket ground. In one of the fires two guard dogs were killed.The first fire was in the early 1960's.Now they are trying to get a number of social events organised for the Astley Bridge Community like a domino club for old age pensioners on Wednesday afternoons.He told us about the special event in August.In August 1985 they are building a temporary stage on the ground.All the operatic societies of Astley Bridge are going to be performing on it and there will be floodlights.They are going to call it Son et Lumiere and that means sound and light.
